title: 53B.72 REQUIRED DISCLOSURES.

variables.name: licensee.engages_in_virtual_currency_business_activity
variables.description: Indicates if the licensee is engaged in virtual currency business activity.

variables.name: disclosure.provided
variables.description: Indicates if the required disclosure is provided to the person.

variables.name: disclosure.clear_and_conspicuous
variables.description: Indicates if the disclosure is made in a clear and conspicuous manner.

variables.name: disclosure.separate_from_other_information
variables.description: Indicates if the disclosure is made separately from other information.

consequences: The licensee complies with the disclosure requirements.

variables.name: relationship.established
variables.description: Indicates if a relationship with the person has been established.

variables.name: disclosure.schedule_of_fees_provided
variables.description: Indicates if the schedule of fees and charges is disclosed.

variables.name: disclosure.insurance_coverage_provided
variables.description: Indicates if the insurance coverage information is disclosed.

variables.name: disclosure.irrevocability_provided
variables.description: Indicates if the irrevocability of a transfer or exchange is disclosed.

variables.name: disclosure.liability_description_provided
variables.description: Indicates if the liability description is disclosed.

variables.name: disclosure.date_time_difference_provided
variables.description: Indicates if the date or time difference information is disclosed.

variables.name: disclosure.stop_payment_rights_provided
variables.description: Indicates if the stop payment rights are disclosed.

variables.name: disclosure.receipt_rights_provided
variables.description: Indicates if the right to receive a receipt is disclosed.

variables.name: disclosure.notice_of_change_provided
variables.description: Indicates if the notice of change in terms is disclosed.

variables.name: disclosure.virtual_currency_not_money
variables.description: Indicates if the statement that virtual currency is not money is disclosed.

consequences: The licensee complies with pre-relationship disclosure requirements.

variables.name: transaction.concluded
variables.description: Indicates if a virtual currency transaction has concluded.

variables.name: confirmation.provided
variables.description: Indicates if a confirmation is provided to the person.

variables.name: confirmation.contains_name_contact
variables.description: Indicates if the confirmation contains the name and contact information of the licensee.

variables.name: confirmation.contains_transaction_details
variables.description: Indicates if the confirmation contains transaction details.

variables.name: confirmation.contains_fee_details
variables.description: Indicates if the confirmation contains fee details.

consequences: The licensee complies with transaction confirmation requirements.

variables.name: disclosure.daily_confirmation_disclosed
variables.description: Indicates if the licensee disclosed the provision of daily confirmation.

variables.name: confirmation.daily_provided
variables.description: Indicates if a daily confirmation is provided instead of per-transaction confirmation.

consequences: The licensee complies with daily confirmation provision requirements.
